name: Star Buffers
description:
In Star Buffs your goal is to destroy as many enemies as you can, using hostile ships and various buffs.

CONTROLS:
• W and S to fly up and down
• A and D to fly left and right
• SPACE to buff
• SHIFT to boost
• E to take control over enemy
• MOUSELEFT to shoot

HOW TO PLAY:
After every take over you get 3 buffs. By pressing SPACE you are using 1 buff and healing yourself, but also your enemies get higher max hp, full health and random buff to statistics.

To take control over enemy you must have enaugh points. By taking control over hostile your old ship destroys itsfelf, and you get as many random buffs as you made in past. Also all of enemies instantly explode and loose all buffs.But be careful. After taking over your health falls faster and enemies are spawning more frequently. 

So enjoy playing. But remember - better way to defeat your enemy is to keep it alive and take control over it!
